reviewText: I purchased these VCDs off the steeleballs website after reading about them in HOW TO DATE YOUNG WOMAN FOR MEN OVER 35 - they are very dated most likely from the 80's they have no relevance on what Don says in his books just a cash grab, the amazing thing is Dons Website actual says there is a 15 minute piece on body language at the end rubbish - all there was his appearance on a TV show as a body language expert nothing wht so ever on body language itself.
